price: (68) We have been promised this, we and our forefathers, before. This is not but legends of the former peoples."
arabic: لَقَدۡ وُعِدۡنَا هَٰذَا نَحۡنُ وَءَابَآؤُنَا مِن قَبۡلُ إِنۡ هَٰذَآ إِلَّآ أَسَٰطِيرُ ٱلۡأَوَّلِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: laqad wuʿid'nā hādhā naḥnu waābāunā min qablu in hādhā illā asāṭīru al-awalīna
